name: App_Cisco_List_MailboxParking
query:
WITH Settings AS (
  					SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN ID = 'ParkingRetentionDays' THEN value END) as 'ParkingRetentionDays',
						   MAX(CASE WHEN ID = 'ParkingAutoDeleteEnabled' THEN value END) as 'ParkingAutoDeleteEnabled'
					FROM f_App_Cisco_List_Settings 
				)

SELECT ID
, UnityUserObjectId
, UnityUserAlias
, UnityUserExtension
, DateCreated
, CASE 
	WHEN Settings.ParkingAutoDeleteEnabled = '0' THEN 'Never' 
    ELSE julianday( date(dateCreated,'+' || Settings.ParkingRetentionDays || ' days') ) - julianday(date('now'))
  end [DaysUntilDeletion]
FROM f_App_Cisco_List_MailboxParking,Settings
WHERE Deleted = '0'
